column4: what's the best way to convert audio formats?  Soundconverter isn't working for me
meh, that's a pretty heavyweight app.  I've got a bunch of wavs I want to be mp3, but sometimes i have flac.  isn't there some lightweight app that can batch process?
i used to have a nautilus script that did it
but it depends on what format the file is in and what format you want to convert it to
you could whack together a script and use mencoder on the command-line
